Thanks uploader! This game is sweet although not super original but it's really good.
To all who have a problem installing the game: please don't blame it on the uploader.I have tested this game (i'm running Vista) and it's worked like a charm.Compared to most games this is the simplest installation process you could ask for.
Simply unzip the file to a folder (i created one on my desktop) , run ARES.exe , go to where the game has been installed (most likely C:Program Files->A.R.E.S.-Extinction Agenda.Go back to the folder where you unzipped the files and copy NFOviewer.exe and past it back into the folder where your game has been installed.
Play and enjoy!

P.S -
If your game crashes (mine did around level 3) , follow alex's link to the update (scroll up) and download it.You'll have to reinstall the game but it won't take long and what's most important , IT WORKS! My game no longer crashes!
